trans-unit.source: Represents a reader that can read a sequential series of characters.
trans-unit.target: 代表可以讀取一連串連續字元的讀取器 (Reader)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> is the abstract base class of <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> and <xref:System.IO.StringReader>, which read characters from streams and strings, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 是抽象基底類別<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>和<xref:System.IO.StringReader>，其讀取的字元資料流和字串，分別。

trans-unit.source: Use these derived classes to open a text file for reading a specified range of characters, or to create a reader based on an existing stream.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟文字檔以供讀取指定的範圍的字元，或建立根據現有的資料流讀取器，請使用這些衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using any type that derives from this type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用衍生自這個型別的任何類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Dispose and the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Dispose 和中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> class derives from <xref:System.IO.TextReader> and provides implementations of the members for reading from a stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.StreamReader>類別衍生自<xref:System.IO.TextReader>，並提供從資料流讀取成員的實作。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to read all the characters in a file by using the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadAsync%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用讀取檔案中的所有字元<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadAsync%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It checks whether each character is a letter, digit, or white space before adding the character to an instance of the <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 會檢查每個字元之前加入的執行個體中的字元是否為字母、 數字或泛空白字元<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must minimally implement the <see cref="M:System.IO.TextReader.Peek" /> and <see cref="M:System.IO.TextReader.Read" /> methods to make a useful instance of <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別必須至少實作<see cref="M:System.IO.TextReader.Peek" />和<see cref="M:System.IO.TextReader.Read" />方法來進行有用的執行個體的<see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor for derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Closes the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> and releases any system resources associated with the <see langword="TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 並釋放任何與 <see langword="TextReader" /> 關聯的系統資源。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of `Close` calls the <xref:System.IO.StringReader.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passes it a `true` value.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作`Close`呼叫<xref:System.IO.StringReader.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並將其傳遞`true`值。

trans-unit.source: Flushing the text reader will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`.
trans-unit.target: 排清的文字讀取器不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Close`。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.AutoFlush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.AutoFlush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`表示從緩衝區資料流，清除資料，但並不會清除編碼器狀態。

trans-unit.source: This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓編碼器將保存其狀態 （部分字元），讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊。

trans-unit.source: This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can be encoded only after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.
trans-unit.target: 這種情況下會影響 UTF8 及 UTF7 其中編碼某些字元才編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元。

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, do not override the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，不會覆寫<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, override the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code for releasing resources.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，覆寫<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將程式碼，以便釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.IO.TextReader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.IO.TextReader>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.IO.TextReader>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.IO.TextReader>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 物件的 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method specifies the `disposing` parameter as `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會指定`disposing`參數做為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> specifies the `disposing` parameter as `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 指定`disposing`參數做為`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.TextReader> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法，小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Provides a <see langword="TextReader" /> with no data to read from.
trans-unit.target: 提供沒有可從中讀取之資料的 <see langword="TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Reading from the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Null> text reader is similar to reading from the end of a stream:
trans-unit.target: 從讀取<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Null>文字讀取器讀取類似從資料流結尾：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A> and <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Peek%2A> methods return -1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>和<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Peek%2A>方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadBlock%2A> method returns zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadBlock%2A>方法會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A> method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A>方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEnd%2A> method returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEnd%2A>方法會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: Reads the next character without changing the state of the reader or the character source.
trans-unit.target: 讀取下一個字元，而不會變更讀取器或字元來源的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next available character without actually reading it from the reader.
trans-unit.target: 傳回下一個可用字元，而不會實際從讀取器讀取。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the next character to be read, or -1 if no more characters are available or the reader does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示要讀取的下一個字元，如果沒有更多字元可供使用或讀取器不支援搜尋，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Peek%2A> method returns an integer value in order to determine whether the end of the file, or another error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Peek%2A>方法會傳回整數值，以判斷是否發生檔案或另一項錯誤的結尾。

trans-unit.source: This allows a user to first check if the returned value is -1 before casting it to a <xref:System.Char> type.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者能夠先檢查 是否傳回的值為-1 的之前先將它轉換<xref:System.Char>型別。

trans-unit.source: The current position of the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> is not changed by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 目前的位置<xref:System.IO.TextReader>不會變更這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is -1 if no more characters are available.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值為-1，如果沒有更多字元可供使用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 預設的實作會傳回 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Peek%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Peek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Peek%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Peek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Reads data from the text reader.
trans-unit.target: 從文字讀取器讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: Reads the next character from the text reader and advances the character position by one character.
trans-unit.target: 自文字讀取器讀取下一個字元，並將字元位置前移一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The next character from the text reader, or -1 if no more characters are available.
trans-unit.target: 文字讀取器的下一個字元；如果不再有字元可供使用，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 預設的實作會傳回 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between <c>index</c> and (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 <c>index</c> 與 (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的字元取代的指定字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中要開始寫入的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: If the end of the reader is reached before the specified number of characters is read into the buffer, the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字元數讀入緩衝區之前，便到達讀取器末端，則方法會返回。

trans-unit.source: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current reader and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從目前讀取器讀取指定的最大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that have been read.
trans-unit.target: 已經讀取的字元數目。

trans-unit.source: The number will be less than or equal to <paramref name="count" />, depending on whether the data is available within the reader.
trans-unit.target: 數目將小於或等於 <paramref name="count" />，取決於資料是否在讀取器中可供使用。

trans-unit.source: This method returns 0 (zero) if it is called when no more characters are left to read.
trans-unit.target: 如果不再有字元可供讀取時呼叫，這個方法傳回 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: This method returns after either `count` characters are read or the end of the file is reached.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回之後`count`讀取的字元或達到檔案結尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadBlock%2A> is a blocking version of this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadBlock%2A> 是封鎖的版本，這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The buffer length minus <paramref name="index" /> is less than <paramref name="count" />.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區長度減去 <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="count" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between <c>index</c> and (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 <c>index</c> 與 (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的字元取代的指定字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中要開始寫入的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: If the end of the text is reached before the specified number of characters is read into the buffer, the current method returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字元數讀入緩衝區之前，便到達文字末端，則目前的方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current text reader asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的文字讀取器非同步讀取指定的最大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the text has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達文字末端，則可能為 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The task completes after either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read or the end of the file is reached.
trans-unit.target: 在工作完成之後指定的字元數目`count`參數讀取或檔案結尾為止。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadAsync%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadAsync%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

trans-unit.source: The text reader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 文字讀取器已處置。

trans-unit.source: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用讀取器。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, this parameter contains the specified character array with the values between <c>index</c> and (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> -1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，此參數會包含其值介於 <c>index</c> 與 (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> -1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的字元取代的指定字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中要開始寫入的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current text reader and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的文字讀取器讀取指定的最大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that have been read.
trans-unit.target: 已經讀取的字元數目。

trans-unit.source: The number will be less than or equal to <paramref name="count" />, depending on whether all input characters have been read.
trans-unit.target: 數目將小於或等於 <paramref name="count" />，取決於是否已經讀取所有輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: The position of the underlying text reader is advanced by the number of characters that were read into `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: 基本的文字讀取器的位置前移成已讀取的字元數`buffer`。

trans-unit.source: The method blocks until either `count` characters are read, or all characters have been read.
trans-unit.target: 方法會封鎖直到`count`讀取字元，或已經讀取所有字元。

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking version of <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這是封鎖版本<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The buffer length minus <paramref name="index" /> is less than <paramref name="count" />.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區長度減去 <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="count" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between <c>index</c> and (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 <c>index</c> 與 (<c>index</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的字元取代的指定字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中要開始寫入的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: If the end of the text is reached before the specified number of characters is read into the buffer, the current method returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字元數讀入緩衝區之前，便到達文字末端，則目前的方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current text reader asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的文字讀取器非同步讀取指定的最大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the text has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達文字末端，則可能為 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The task does not complete until either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read, or the end of the text has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 工作未完成，直到指定的字元數目`count`會讀取參數，或已經到達文字末端。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

trans-unit.source: The text reader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 文字讀取器已處置。

trans-unit.source: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Reads a line of characters from the text reader and returns the data as a string.
trans-unit.target: 自文字讀取器讀取一行字元，並將資料以字串傳回。

trans-unit.source: The next line from the reader, or <see langword="null" /> if all characters have been read.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器中的下一行；如果已經讀取所有字元，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return (0x000d), a line feed (0x000a), a carriage return followed by a line feed, <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or the end-of-stream marker.
trans-unit.target: 一條線定義為一串字元後面接著歸位字元 (0x000d)、 換行字元 (0x000a)，以歸位換行字元，後面接著<xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或資料流結尾標記。

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned does not contain the terminating carriage return or line feed.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串沒有結尾的歸位字元或換行字元。

trans-unit.source: The return value is `null` if the end of the input stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是`null`如果已到達輸入資料流的結尾。

trans-unit.source: If the method throws an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> exception, the reader's position in the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters that were already read into the internal <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A> buffer are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在方法擲回<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>例外狀況，在基礎讀取器的位置<xref:System.IO.Stream>進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已經已讀入至內部的字元數<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A>緩衝區是捨棄。

trans-unit.source: Because the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters that were already read are unrecoverable and can be accessed only by reinitializing the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 無法變更資料流中讀取器的位置，因為已讀取的字元無法復原，並可重新初始化來存取<xref:System.IO.TextReader>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> also needs to be reinitialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果是未知的資料流的初始位置，或資料流不支援搜尋，基礎<xref:System.IO.Stream>也必須重新初始化。

trans-unit.source: To avoid such a situation and produce robust code you should use the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A> method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這種情況，並產生穩定的程式碼，您應該使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠記憶體可為傳回的字串配置緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the next line is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />
trans-unit.target: 下一行中的字元數大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads a line of characters asynchronously and returns the data as a string.
trans-unit.target: 非同步讀取一行字元，並將資料以字串傳回。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the next line from the text reader, or is <see langword="null" /> if all of the characters have been read.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 參數的值會包含文字讀取器中的下一行；如果已經讀取所有字元，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLineAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLineAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.IO.TextReader> represents the standard input stream returned by the <xref:System.Console.In%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A> method executes synchronously rather than asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前<xref:System.IO.TextReader>代表所傳回的標準輸入資料流<xref:System.Console.In%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A>同步而不是以非同步方式執行方法。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the next line is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 下一行中的字元數大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The text reader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 文字讀取器已處置。

trans-unit.source: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the text reader and returns them as one string.
trans-unit.target: 讀取從目前位置到文字讀取器末端的所有字元，並將它們以單一字串傳回。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains all characters from the current position to the end of the text reader.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含從目前位置到文字讀取器結尾的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: If the method throws an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> exception, the reader's position in the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters that were already read into the internal <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEnd%2A> buffer are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在方法擲回<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>例外狀況，在基礎讀取器的位置<xref:System.IO.Stream>進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已經已讀入至內部的字元數<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEnd%2A>緩衝區是捨棄。

trans-unit.source: Because the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters that were already read are unrecoverable and can be accessed only by reinitializing the <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 無法變更資料流中讀取器的位置，因為已讀取的字元無法復原，並可重新初始化來存取<xref:System.IO.TextReader>。

trans-unit.source: If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> also needs to be reinitialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果是未知的資料流的初始位置，或資料流不支援搜尋，基礎<xref:System.IO.Stream>也必須重新初始化。

trans-unit.source: To avoid such a situation and produce robust code you should use the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A> method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這種情況，並產生穩定的程式碼，您應該使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.Read%2A>讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEnd%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEnd%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠記憶體可為傳回的字串配置緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the next line is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />
trans-unit.target: 下一行中的字元數大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the text reader asynchronously and returns them as one string.
trans-unit.target: 非同步讀取從目前位置到文字讀取器末端的所有字元，並將它們以單一字串傳回。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains a string with the characters from the current position to the end of the text reader.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 參數的值會包含字串，該字串含有從目前位置到文字讀取器結尾的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> class is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextReader> 類別是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEndAsync%2A> method, see the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEndAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadToEndAsync%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEndAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 字元數大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The text reader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 文字讀取器已處置。

trans-unit.source: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TextReader" /> to synchronize.
trans-unit.target: 要同步處理的 <see langword="TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread-safe wrapper around the specified <see langword="TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 <see langword="TextReader" /> 內建立安全執行緒的包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: A thread-safe <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The current method returns a class that wraps around the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader> instance and restricts access to it by multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 目前的方法會傳回指定周圍包裝的類別<xref:System.IO.TextReader>執行個體，並由多個執行緒會限制存取。

trans-unit.source: All reads from the returned wrapper will be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包裝函式的所有讀取將會都是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
